text: Piotr Piasecki (born 4 September 1952) is a Polish equestrian. He competed at the 1992 Summer Olympics and the 1996 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:Polish male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Poland Category:Equestrians at the 1992 Summer Olympics Category:Equestrians at the 1996 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Szczecin
title: Piotr Piasecki
